title: Faxt
content:
I needed to create a "fax" bitmap face for a project I'm working on. I got perhaps excessively creative -- it isn't quite as faithful to real fax characters (I mean the date and time stamps that appear on faxes). Anyway, this was what I ended up with.   
   
 ![faxt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220023im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1204.jpg)
author: glutton

comments.content: Apparently Dave Cushman/Dirt Type has a fax font called Faxt. So much for my originality.
